thread.title: This song is for Indian women

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: This song is for Indian women
text:
Madhiyaal Vel starring Ajai Prasath (of Rajathanthiram fame) and Shreya Gupta has a special song dedicated to women. The song, which appears in the climax scene, we hear, is dedicated to Indian women.
Lyrics for the song are by Kabilan Vairamuthu and music is by Balamurali Balu. There are three songs in the film. In the meantime, the shoot for the film has already been wrapped up and the film is slated to release in November.
